subject: French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andrea Petkovic, seeded 12th, and Julia Görges, seeded 17th, are riding high now and beginning to generate the sort of buzz that German women’s tennis has been lacking.
snippet: Andrea Petkovic, seeded 12th, and Julia Görges, seeded 17th, are riding high now and beginning to generate the sort of buzz that German women’s tennis has been lacking.
